Visibility: 24.1 km

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
